Text:
please, as I said in anothe comment, could we just have a aio (all in one) like the 2006 one?
I put about 12 gigs back into that thing and i'd be willing to do the same if it were done again.
It will happen, but at the moment I'm barely finding the time to put these up one by one. Give me a week or so :)

Shankly this is the last one I am doing art for but I won't be able to download it until I get home(the b******* block everything here). Could you give me a heads up on where this will split to fit on CDs. The way you have it listed there seems 5CDs but with 3 tracks left over. It willl save me a bit of time waiting for it to download.

You can find the art here along with all Shankly's 2007 compilations
http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3972158

Archivist - In truth, the mixtapes would be better done in tribute to thelate John Peel and I try to produce at least one mix a month that I feel would live up to his musical taste. 

But Peel considered Shankly to be the greatest man who ever lived, so...
